about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'Famous Landowner's Daughter' story from 'Obedient Women'.

Famous Landowner's Daughter

HEROINE:
Kotomi Nagasaki
Her fresh body gets overexcited and frustrated at a certain time every week.

SYNOPSIS (Famous Landowner's Daughter)


A young woman needs to do some work for the neighborhood association.
Her husband is twenty years older than her and always busy with work, so she's going to handle it.
She's going to manage such things as festivals, travel and more this year.
She actually doesn't want to, but just needs to do it for the neighborhood.
After attending the association meetings several times, she starts cheating with a young man.
Gradually, she becomes careless about it and then, after realizing that other young men know about her infidelity...
One day, she has to work late for the association while her husband is away on a business trip. As she engages in sex with her partner, who asked her to wear a school uniform, two other guys suddenly appear and join the fun.
(The men are excited to have sex with a chick wearing a school uniform.)
Her crotch is already sopping wet and she experiences a ton of orgasms from all the guys' fondling and tonguing her. She doesn't remember how many times she had sex all night with them.
Afterwards, she continues to have sex with all of them when her husband is on his business trips.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and latest driver
